thread.title: Hollywood Wax Museum Announces Promotion and Search for High-Level Position
thread.title_full: Hollywood Wax Museum Announces Promotion and Search for High-Level Position

author: Aileen Stein
title: Hollywood Wax Museum Announces Promotion and Search for High-Level Position
text:
Kuvera Partners has announced the promotion of Chuck O’Day from General Manager of the Hollywood Wax Museum Entertainment Center in Branson, MO to Director of Attractions. O’Day will oversee the operations of Kuvera’s attractions nationwide, as well as continue to play a key role in the company’s support of the Spirit of 76 and the development of the Grand Palace property. A native of Branson, O’Day has been with Kuvera Partners since the company opened the Hollywood Wax Museum on the Highway 76 strip on March 25, 1996. In addition to demonstrating excellence in facility and staff management and customer service, he was instrumental in Kuvera’s renovation of the museum in 2009 and the development of three new attractions in Branson: Hannah's Maze of Mirrors, Shoot for the Stars Mini-Golf ( http://www.shootforthestarsminigolf.com ), and Castle of Chaos ( http://www.5dadventure.com ). He has gone on to set up and standardize operations at Kuvera’s attractions in Pigeon Forge, TN and Myrtle Beach, SC and shows solid leadership with General Managers across the company.
With O’Day’s promotion, Kuvera Partners is seeking to hire an experienced General Manager for the Branson facilities at 3030 West 76 Country Blvd. This key member of the team will report to O’Day and have overall responsibility for providing outstanding customer experience and maximizing revenue at the four attractions.
A more detailed Job Posting & Application are available online. To best manage the selection process, interested candidates must first apply online .
